channel.title: A free pure account? No way
channel.description:
;)
Obviously I'm not giving an account away, the title is misleading to bring more attention to the thread.
[url=http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/c=6w*2arEsvKI/forums.ws?241,242,98,61778264]http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/c=6w*2arEsvKI/forums.ws?241,242,98,61778264[/url]
Support my thread, its to support stat resetting/exp lock.
Ha thanks.

item.source: A free pure account? No way

item.title: A free pure account? No way
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Wow topic approved. Please stop arguing about rules, it’s starting to give me a headache.

Okay well, this is an interesting idea. I’d say the only suggestion even considerable by Jagex would be your first, though it makes the game even less realistic. If you do an action, you gain experience in that action. It’s a pretty simple concept.

The dialog would be too hard to control, would spam, and most players don’t care about making a pure so, that’s definitely a no. Having a controlled option is far from dumb, to be honest. A lot of people don’t quite seem to understand the value of the controlled option. I have 90 attack, strength, and defense. I can get to 99 attack, strength, and defense with an abyssal whip, taking the amount of time it would take to get 2 of those skills to 99, using the standard methods. This is an approximate 33% increase in experience, and a 33% decrease in time. Yea, controlled is that awesome.

Not trying to burst your bubble or anything, it takes an incredible amount of support to even be considered by Jagex. You see suggestions all the time with hundreds of pages of replies, and Jagex still doesn’t really consider them. Why? Because the entire forum userbase is something like 5% of the RuneScape population. 100 pages of replies is only, at most, 5% of the forum population. I think you can do the math from there.

I think it’s a useful idea, but I’m generally indifferent. If I ever make a pure, I just won’t train defense if I don’t want defense. Pretty simple, if you ask me. I also don’t think Jagex is even going to consider this idea, but maybe I’m just being a cynic.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:19, topic:363919”][quote author=Rules]
You shouldn’t be looking for loopholes in them, rather, you should just get along with them. We’re looking for users that use common sense. For example, we would prefer a user that knows, just because something isn’t on the rules, that it it isn’t necessarily allowed.

…
…
…

Rule 6:
We don’t post misleading links, put appropriate warnings(while there’s no specific rules on adult content, if you don’t use Not Safe For Work(NSFW) warnings, you will be punished).
[/quote]

This is like having a thread titled ‘Free ice cream’ but its content is to vote for a server![/quote]

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

An EXP lock in RS would be kind of neat. Considering I gave my account to my friend (I still know the password, tihi), I could EXP lock something and mess with him >:D

Although, I don’t think JaGex would ever implement this. I mean really, whats the point in it? Would someone really EXP lock cooking or slayer? I think not.

Read full topic
item.source: A free pure account? No way

item.title: A free pure account? No way
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:16, topic:363919”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=460160.msg3366513#msg3366513 date=1286834199]
I understand where you are coming from, but I don’t support. I think that if you level, it’s your fault. Make a new account if you care that much. It should also be noted, that if you accidentally level, say, defense, it won’t change your combat level if you are a mage or range pure.

Ways to prevent leveling:
If you are a skiller pure, always have auto-retaliate off.
If you are a magician pure, always carry at least enough runes to cast 5 of your combat spell, and have auto-cast on.
If you are a range pure, always carry 5 arrows equipped and a bow.

If you do it for the mentality: ‘oh, my defense level is 1!’, make a new account and follow the tips above. If you have your main account, and feel like you want to reset some of your stats, you’re out of luck. Jagex will never reset your skills unless you really want to reset all of your skills, in which case they will probably just delete your account and tell you to re-register it. But note that they might not even do that.
[/quote]
He didnt mean any skils. If you read his RS topic it says defence under 10[/quote]Defense happens to be a skill.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I understand where you are coming from, but I don’t support. I think that if you level, it’s your fault. Make a new account if you care that much. It should also be noted, that if you accidentally level, say, defense, it won’t change your combat level if you are a mage or range pure.

Ways to prevent leveling:
If you are a skiller pure, always have auto-retaliate off.
If you are a magician pure, always carry at least enough runes to cast 5 of your combat spell, and have auto-cast on.
If you are a range pure, always carry 5 arrows equipped and a bow.

If you do it for the mentality: ‘oh, my defense level is 1!’, make a new account and follow the tips above. If you have your main account, and feel like you want to reset some of your stats, you’re out of luck. Jagex will never reset your skills unless you really want to reset all of your skills, in which case they will probably just delete your account and tell you to re-register it. But note that they might not even do that.
